subject: Differences between products?
description_text: Good morning, What are the differences between these 3 products? They all have the same name. Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback simsonn.com Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals with Baseplate and Carbon Fiber Heel Plate simsonn.com Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional simsonn.com Any help would be greatly appreciated. Sincerely, Keiji Suzuya

conversations.body_text: Hi Keiji Suzuya,  The difference is in the configuration: some are 3-pedal sets, some are 3 pedals with haptic motors, and others are 3 pedals with a base plate.Â
